name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glassdoor Jobs Exporter - Scrape jobs to csv

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export job data from Glassdoor's job listings to a CSV file with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly scrape Glassdoor jobs data!

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open an Glassdoor job search result page.
2️⃣ Click open our extension, then click the Export button.
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Run in the background without waiting for finish.
2️⃣ Export on multiple job search result pages simultaneous.
3️⃣ Export jobs data for current search result to a csv file, data include: Job Title, Job Id, Job Url, Employer Id, Employer Name, Location, Job Pay, Pay Currency, Pay Period, Age In Days, Rating, Easy Apply.

🎯 Targeted Users: numerous parties, including HR managers, recruiters, and business owners  alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your jobs data management and make informed decisions with Glassdoor Jobs Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Glassdoor ❗️🔒
